name: Fish Saves The Ocean
description:
A game made for the team seas game jam.

Team seas is a iniciative to help get trash out of the ocean. if you can please donate here:https://teamseas.org

This game is about a fish that is sick of have his home full of trash and decided to clean it up by making the trash-vacum 3000!!  

Get all the trash you can in a timer, and don't forget to eat food so you get more time!

Ps : you get a speed bost for eatch trash you colect

I had a lot of fun making this game so I hope you have Fun!

Controls:

-Wasd or arrows to move

-w to pass the cutscenes

-mouse for Navigating the menu

-Q to go back to the menu

-R to reset and retry

Credits:

Game - Its_F4llen

Music : Funny but from:  -https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6

known "bug" :  the music doesn't dupe.
